channel.title: Claymore on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Claymore on Strat

item.title: Mothership 1E
item.description: A sci-fi horror tabletop RPG with some of the most evocative RPG modules I’ve ever read. I can’t wait to play this!

item.title: FIST: Ultra Edition
item.description: Metal Gear / A-Team inspired tabletop RPG. Seems like this would be great for one-shots (or potentially longer campaigns) with people with any level of experience in roleplaying because the rules are so simple yet exciting.
